name: Psychedelic Space Simulator
description:
Ground to Major, bye bye Tom...

Psychedelic Space Simulator is intended to be an exploration experience as well as a seek and collect game. You must collect. mandalas to gain access to higher states of consciousness.

***

I advise players to use a dualshock 3 playstation controller, but the game can also played with the keyboard/mouse. Windows and linux builds are coming... but I don't know when. This is my first game ever and I'm excited to share it with you all. Feedback is much welcome !

***

NB : Windows and Linux builds are not fully tested yet.

Music by Chaos E.T. Sexual and eqko
